body.name: Beige Comforter Set King Size, Cream 3 Pieces Tufted Comforter Set, Lightweight Neutral Bedding Set, Soft and Fluffy Microfiber Comforter for All Seasons (104x90in Comforter & 2 Pillowcases)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 25 mins
features: Exquisite Boho Tufted Dot Embroidery Design: Charming polka dots of tufted texture are scattered across this cream comforter set king, backed with flat sheeting that's so soft to the touch. Aesthetics and function are perfectly integrated with this tufted dot beige bedding. It will be a captivating addition to your space!

Experience Cloud-like Softness: Crafted from soft microfiber and filled with weightless yet luxurious materials, Paxrac beige king size comforter set offers an amazing level of softness and a smooth, dreamy touch. Indulge in a peaceful and cozy sleep as it envelops you in its luxuriously soft embrace, providing the perfect sanctuary for your dreams.

Lightweight and Fluffy All-Season Comfort: Our lightweight ivory comforter set king keeps you comfortably warm without making you sweat, making it an ideal choice for hot sleepers. Whether you use it on its own during the summer or layer it for extra warmth in colder months, you will enjoy its perfect balance of warmth and breathability.

Easy Care and Pet Friendly: Paxrac 3-piece king beige bed set is designed to make your life easier. It's machine washable in the gentle cycle with cold water. Air dry or tumble dry on low heat. Our bed comforter set doesn't attract your pet hair. Holding up to dog/cat paws and dog/cat hair brushes off easily.

What's included: King comforter set includes 1 comforter (104x90 inches), 2 pillowcases (20x36 inches). Our comforter set is packaged cylindrically to minimize wrinkles and maximize fluffiness. Before first use, we recommend washing and tumble drying on low temperature to puff up the comforter. Alternatively, expose it to sunlight and tap gently to re-fluff it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cozy and luxurious!
reviews.reviewText: I like that this is lightweight, yet warm. Some have mentioned it’s too warm, but I haven’t experienced that. It does seem breathable.I thought the whole outside was 100% cotton, but after re-reading the description, it appears to be microfiber on the top and cotton on the underside.It’s light and fluffy. As some mentioned, it does have some wrinkles, but I imagine that fluffing it in the dryer will help.I have a question out regarding if the stuffing will shift when washing. I haven’t tested that yet.The color is perfect. I had been searching for a beautiful rust color and this is it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my granddaughter’s room
reviews.reviewText: So soft. Beautiful. Well made. My little peanut will love her new room at Nonna’s house

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought on sale for a great price. It is a nice lightweight comforter set. Color is great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Warm, Very Wrinkled
reviews.reviewText: Let's be clear, this is a very economical choice for a comforter, and you should not expect it to be completely perfect.Pros- The filling is very soft and lightweight- Creates a great cozy feeling- The color (I bought sage green) is true to the images- The king size does actually cover a king bed, however it does not drape all the way to the ground like the pictures display it, but it does come about halfway down to the floor on all sides, which for me having an 18-inch mattress, puts it where it hits right at the beginning of my dust ruffle, so it works out- It does seem to repel pet hair, I have two cats with lots of white fur that sleep with us every night and it doesn't seem to be collecting it- King size fits in my top load washing machine, no need to pay to have it launderedCons- Even after washing, it is still wrinkly from the vacuum packing not sure how long it will take for those to come out- If you are a hot sleeper, this will not be good for you outside of Fall and Winter- While the fabric may be pet hair resistant, I think that is because the topside material is not extremely soft, it kind of reminds me of a windbreaker or nylon material, when you rub it together it makes a noise, it is not uncomfortably rough or anything, but it is not lamb soft, just have to decide if pet hair or softness is a bigger priorityOverall, I am happy with this purchase for the price! I would recommend it. My biggest hang-up is the wrinkles, hopefully they come out soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty! It is lightweight, but enough to keep you warm on those cold nights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This looks and feels way more expensive than it was. I bought this for an all-white guest bedroom. It looks heavenly and is well-made. My most recent guest said it was very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This IS NOT COTTON. It’s nylon. No way to get out wrinkles. Comes in a very small box. It’s awful. Description is completely a lie. I’ve been hunting for a cotton bedspread and this certainly isnt it. I’m so angry Amazon doesn’t care what’s written about their products. It doesn’t even have a tag saying what it’s made of. Only thing that says it’s cotton is on the website. I thought it was illegal to sell anything without revealing contents. The picture online shows a totally different one than you receive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: First, this comforter is nice looking, looks as it does online, except it is very wrinkled. I put the comforter in the dryer, and some of the wrinkles came out, but not all. I washed the pillow cases, put them in the dryer, and the wrinkles still did not come out. The other issue is that I do not believe the underside of the comforter is 100% cotton. The description says the top of the comforter is 70% cotton. Judging by the feel of the material, I think the whole thing is perhaps a 50% cotton blend. The label does not state the material. Still, it is a nice weight, is comfortable with my 100% cotton sheet, so I am keeping it. The price was really good. I have a Queen size bed, and I ordered the king. It's a perfect size. I would recommend, despite the "cotton" question.
El color es como viene en la fotoTe la super suaveMe. Encantó

Esta muy bonito, calientito y no pesa. Muy buen artículo lo compraría de nuevo en otro color. Por poco no lo encuentro ya que el repartidor lo dejo afuera de la puerta de mi casa y no me avisó 🤔 Tache para los repartidores ❌
Es super lindo, mi único pero es que yo no leí y lo esperaba de algodón y no lo es, a pesar de eso es una tela muy suave que cae muy bien aunque sea combinado sintético .

reviews.reviewTitle: Está hermoso aunque un poco caliente
reviews.reviewText: Es un edredón hermoso! Es super suavecito, delicado, elegante y de una tela de gran calidad. Para tiempo de calor es caliente, pero para el frío es delicioso. El color es perfecto, un rosa ideal, ni tan pálido ni tan intenso.Viene empacado a presión y no huele a nada.Lo recomiendo muchísimo.
